title: News24.com | WATCH | Only few signs of a lockdown in Hillbrow as residents loiter and move about
description: There was the usual hustle and bustle in Hillbrow in Johannesburg on Wednesday, with only a few signs that a lockdown was in effect.
content:
It was Day Six of South Africa's 21-day lockdown on Wednesday, but it seemed to be a normal mid-week afternoon in Hillbrow, Johannesburg.
The suburb is situated in the province which has the most coronavirus infections since the outbreak hit the country in M… [+1646 chars]
